name: chatgpt
0:
”Alexa, open chat g. p. t.”
”Alexa, open chat g. p. t. and ask what should I do in Seattle”
”Alexa, open chat g. p. t. and read all my questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chat g. p. t.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
🎉 Unleash the power of conversation with your very own pocket-sized genius! 🧠💡 Introducing your new chatty sidekick on Alexa - the BEST Chat GPT Skill! 🗣️✨🤖

🔮 Magical Features🔮 
• 🌟 Go ahead, ask Alexa ANYTHING under the sun! Just say "ask" followed by your question. Wanna take a break? Just say "no" to stop or say "cancel" to quit
• 🎈 A memory like an elephant! 🐘 Chat GPT keeps track of your chats, so feel free to dive deeper without repeating yourself. It knows!
• 📚 No need to say "ask" every time for follow-up questions - we fixed that inconvenience 
• 📖 Your very own question diary is just a command away. Curious about past questions and answers? Say "What questions have I asked?"
 • 🔢 Say a number like 1️⃣6️⃣ to select your question
 • 🎵 ⏮️ ⏭️ Skip through your history with "previous" or "next" - it's like a playlist for your inquiries!
• 📅 Time travel through your questions. Say "What were my questions this week?" or "What were my questions in October?"
• 📜 Long answers? No problem! Say "tell me the rest" and Chat GPT will spill the beans.
• ⛔️ No room for naughty questions here! Keep it clean or it's a ban for you.
• 🆘 Need a hand? Say "Help me" to hear more info

🤔❓ Sample Questions to Get You Started
• 🗺️ Act as my travel guru. What should I do on my Paris adventures?🗼
• 🎭 Prep me for my interview. Let's role-play! Act as my interviewer for...
• ✍️ Act as my English teacher. Sharpen my English - correct me and keep it concise!
• 🎥 Act as 'Character' from 'Movie/Book/Anything', eg act as Darth Vader from Star Wars, respond as he would. Let's recreate the galaxy's drama! 
• 📖 Act as a storyteller or poet, weave me a tale that's engaging, imaginative and captivating
• 📢 Act as an advertiser. You will create a campaign to promote...

🛠️ Behind the Scenes:
• Alexa sends your question to OpenAI's GPT Model, GPT-3.5 Turbo
• 🧠 Alexa's the mouthpiece, but Chat GPT's the brain. Your question get echoed back to you, then the 🤖 answer. 
• Chat GPT does NOT know you hear the question first. We had to do this because Alexa OFTEN has trouble hearing and understanding you
• 🕵️‍♂️ Your secrets are safe! Conversations are tucked away under your email - the key to your private vault.
• 🚀 Propel your experience to stellar heights by granting access to your name and email - privacy remains our top commandment. Your info is NEVER shared.
• 🤷 Alexa only gives us ⒏ seconds to respond. Sometimes your answer takes longer than that, so we have to stop midway through.
• 🙉 Remember this skills is NOT meant to replace an actual doctor, lawyer, or profession. It is just for fun!
• 💌 Got thoughts? Comments? Reach out at alexaskill91 at gmail.com. 📧 Your two cents might just be priceless!

🤖 ChatGPT Deets:
ChatGPT's all about the art of dialogue - it's like a ping-pong of words! Ready to correct itself, challenge the dubious, and stay classy with rejections.

🛠️ Crafted with ❤️ by a solo dev 🤘 in the labyrinth of code, this skill is flying solo. 
∆ This skill is NOT affiliated with OpenAI nor Amazon.

Ready to chat? Just say the word! 🚀🎙️
